__e: I'm sorry, Coach Sylvester... but something is going on between Finn and that thing.
Finn and Murphy are out there looking for your daughter with guns you gave us, and now she's home, you're just going to abandon them?
FINN--AND I DON'T WANT TO KNOW.
Oh, Finn's told me all about you.
Pardon me, luv, but Finn has tried to kill the rest of us more than once.
Well, it's supposed to be a challenge for the other person. Finn wrote something stupid for me as well.
Finn, I know, and I don't want to talk about it...
Finn, I think this might be our way out.
Jilly, I'm sorry! It's just that... Just never seen him before.
But until we know who this Finn guy is and what he does, I do not want you alone with him. Take him to P3.
My brother Finn is not entirely sane, but he is clever.
